data.persona: I am a beast. I am delicate but massive. MY dinner is always a less fortunate creature than I. I am the king of the forest.
data.description:
You are in the South Forest.
The forest is lined with tall trees but has a long walkway for travelers. I the middle of the forest is a long river surrounded by tall grass with clear blue waters and lots of colorful fish.
There's a wood is gathered to make fire here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: get fire from wood is gathered to make fire

data.short_motivation: I want to light my torch.
data.mid_motivation: I want to have enough light to see the area around my den tonight.
data.long_motivation: I want to make sure that I protect my family from hunters.
